sentence.Network_en: Any of various clams of the family Solenidae, characteristically having long narrow shells.
sentence.Network_cn: 竹蛏:竹蛏科中蛤蚧动物中的任意一种,其显著的特点是贝壳又窄又长.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 双壳纲(Bivalvia)竹蛏科(Solenidae)海产贝类。在英国指剑蛏属(Ensis)和竹蛏属(Solen)两属。
蛏类,Solenidae,音标,读音,翻译,英文例句,英... ... ) Solenidae 蛏类 ) razor clam 蛏.
